name: The Hangry Volcano
description:
A game about ritualistic sacrifice to the volcano Gods! Talk to the Shaman and he will tell you what sacrifice the volcano gods require. Find it and feed the volcano! Be aware to not anger the volcano gods by bringing them the wrong food or your island may not survive!

Pier-Olivier Boivin - Programmer,

Vinay Dhill - Level Design,

Mehmet Erdem Gunay - Programmer,

Joshua Haag - Programmer,

Rashad Mohammed - Programmer, 

Mason Rancourt - 3D Modeller and Artist, and 

Josh Taylor - Programmer.
